vclaim: A video shows a grandparent gifting a copy of "Mein Kampf" to a grandchild who requested Minecraft for Christmas.
title: Did This ‘Minecraft’ for ‘Mein Kampf’ Verbal Mix-Up Really Happen?
subtitle: Minecraft is one of the best-selling video games of all time. "Mein Kampf" is not.
author: Dan Evon
